Name: Name Change, Rudy Macina Peace Memorial Plaza, Bronx
Title: A Local Law in relation to a plaza, Rudy Macina Peace Memorial Plaza, Borough of the Bronx.
BodyName: Parks, Recreation, Cultural Affairs, and International Intergroup Relations

History.BodyName: Parks, Recreation, Cultural Affairs, and International Intergroup Relations
Parks, Recreation, Cultural Affairs, and International Intergroup Relations

Text:
Be it enacted by the Council as follows:


      Section 1.  The following plaza name is hereby designated as hereafter indicated.
_________________________________________________________________  	
New name			Present name		Limits
_________________________________________________________________
Rudy Macina			Peace Memorial		the intersection
Peace Memorial		Plaza				of Williamsbridge
Plaza								Road and Esplanade
      													 
__________________________________________________________________ 
      
      ï¿½2.  This local law shall take effect immediately.




FN:ts
LS#1341
03/3/99
